data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Santos Laguna.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in high up the field for Santos Laguna in Toluca.
Julio Furch (Santos Laguna) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 12, Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Toluca have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 15, Santos Laguna's Bryan Garnica is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Toluca in the half of Santos Laguna.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
In the minute 17, Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Toluca.
Fernando Gorriaran is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Santos Laguna's Fernando Gorriaran looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 23, Fernando Gorriaran for Santos Laguna gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Toluca a goal kick.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 26, Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Santos Laguna.
In the minute 28, Bryan Garnica of Santos Laguna smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Toluca.
Toluca's Rubens Sambueza gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 34, Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 35, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
Alan Medina is replacing Jonatan Maidana for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 39, Santos Laguna drives forward and Walter Sandoval gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Walter Sandoval puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 43, Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Toluca throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Adrian Mora (Toluca) has received a yellow card from Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
In the minute 50, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 53, It's now 0-2 in Toluca as Octavio Rivero scores for Santos Laguna.
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
Jose Manuel De la Torre is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Nemesio Diez with Michael Estrada replacing Diego Abella.
In the minute 56, Jose Manuel De la Torre (Toluca) is making a third substitution, with Kevin Castaneda replacing Javier Guemez.
Can Toluca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos Laguna's half?
Throw-in Toluca.
In the minute 59, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos Laguna needs to be cautious. Toluca have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 62, Free kick in a good position for Toluca!
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a throw-in for Toluca, close to Santos Laguna's area.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Toluca.
Toluca have a dangerous throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Toluca close to the penalty box.
In the minute 67, Rubens Sambueza (Toluca) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Toluca Toluca attack through Adrian Mora. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
In the minute 67, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Bryan Garnica with Ulises Rivas. This is the first substitution made today by Jorge Guillermo Almada.
In the minute 69, Free kick Santos Laguna.
Toluca's Rubens Sambueza has been booked in Toluca.
The match at Estadio Nemesio Diez has been interrupted briefly for a check on David Andrade, who is down injured.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 71, David Andrade has recovered and rejoins the match in Toluca.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Santos Laguna are coming forward and Ulises Rivas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Toluca pushes forward through Michael Estrada, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 73, Toluca's Enrique Triverio is on target but unsuccessful.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the away team a throw-in.
Jorge Guillermo Almada is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Nemesio Diez with Eduardo Aguirre replacing Octavio Rivero.
Santos Laguna drives forward and Ulises Rivas gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, The away team have replaced Walter Sandoval with Adrian Lozano. This is the third substitution made today by Jorge Guillermo Almada.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
Jose Manuel De la Torre (Toluca) is making a fourth substitution, with Joao Plata replacing Carlos Cisneros.
Toluca's Antonio Rios is whistled for offside at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Santos Laguna make their fourth substitution with Alan Cervantes replacing Diego Valdes.
In the minute 87, Jesus Ocejo is replacing Julio Furch for Santos Laguna at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Brandon Sartiaguin for Toluca has been booked by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of Toluca.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Toluca.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Toluca's half.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 1-2 through a strike by Michael Estrada. .
